itinerary.mapNote: North arm of the O. Farmhouse camp on Paine river. 300m.
Lago Dickson shore. Remote north section. 400m.
Lenga beech forest before the pass. 400m.

itinerary.route: Los Perros to Grey (via Gardner Pass)
itinerary.mapNote: On the shore of Lago Grey beside the glacier. 150m.
Main hub on Lago Pehoé with ferry connection. 150m.

itinerary.route: Paine Grande to Los Cuernos (via Frances)
itinerary.mapNote: Below the Cuernos horns. Lago Nordenskjöld shore. 90m.
Valley camp below Torres. Last stop before iconic viewpoint. 450m.

itinerary.route: Chileno to Mirador Base Torres & Exit
itinerary.mapNote: Circuit finish. Mirador Base de las Torres viewpoint 900m above.

waypoints.name: Mirador Base Las Torres
waypoints.note: The three granite towers reflected in tarn. 4am hike from Chileno.

waypoints.name: John Gardner Pass
waypoints.note: O Circuit highpoint. First view of Grey Glacier from summit.

waypoints.name: Grey Glacier
waypoints.note: Largest glacier in Patagonia outside Antarctica. Striking blue ice.

waypoints.name: Mirador del Francés
waypoints.note: Valle del Francés hanging glaciers and cascading waterfalls.

waypoints.name: Los Cuernos (The Horns)
waypoints.note: Dark metamorphic caps fused onto granite spires. Circuit icon.

waypoints.name: Paine Grande
waypoints.note: Highest peak in the massif. Visible from Grey and Paine Grande hut.

waypoints.name: Lago Nordenskjöld
waypoints.note: Turquoise lake stretching beneath the Cuernos. Wind-whipped.
